SELECT A.BRD_NUM /*게시글 번호*/ , A.BRD_GUBN /*게시글 구분*/ , A.PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_PD_NM(A.PD_CODE) FROM DUAL) AS PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , A.BRD_SBJT /*게시글 제목*/ , A.BRD_CONT /*게시글 내용*/ , A.PD_PTS /*상품 별점*/ , A.BRD_HITS /*게시글 조회수*/ , A.WRTR_ID /*작성자ID*/ , TO_CHAR(A.WRT_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRT_DTM /*작성일시*/ , A.SCWT_YN /*비밀글여부*/ , A.BRD_PW /*게시글 비밀번호*/ , A.QNA_REPLY /*QNA답변*/ , DECODE(REP_ID, NULL, 'N', 'Y') AS REPLY_YN /*답변여부*/ , A.REP_ID /*답변자ID*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.REP_ID) FROM DUAL) AS REP_NM /*답변자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(A.REPLY_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS REPLY_DTM /*답변일시*/ , A.DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ , A.REGP_ID /*최초등록자*/ , A.REG_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , A.MODP_ID /*수정자*/ , A.MOD_DTM /*수정일시*/ , B.MEMB_NAME AS WRTR_NM /*작성자 명*/ , B.MEMB_MAIL /*작성자 이메일*/ , B.MEMB_CPON /*작성자 연락처*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.BRD_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS BRD_GUBN_NM /*게시글 구분명*/ , A.ORDER_NUM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDBORDXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM B ON A.WRTR_ID = B.MEMB_ID
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC, BRD_NUM DESC

SELECT A.BRD_NUM /*게시글 번호*/ , A.BRD_GUBN /*게시글 구분*/ , A.PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_PD_NM(A.PD_CODE) FROM DUAL) AS PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , A.BRD_SBJT /*게시글 제목*/ , A.BRD_CONT /*게시글 내용*/ , A.PD_PTS /*상품 별점*/ , A.BRD_HITS /*게시글 조회수*/ , A.WRTR_ID /*작성자ID*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.WRTR_ID) FROM DUAL) AS WRTR_NM /*작성자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(A.WRT_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm:ss') AS WRT_DTM /*작성일시*/ , A.SCWT_YN /*비밀글여부*/ , A.BRD_PW /*게시글 비밀번호*/ , A.QNA_REPLY /*QNA답변*/ , DECODE(A.REP_ID, NULL, 'N', 'Y') AS REPLY_YN /*답변여부*/ , A.REP_ID /*답변자ID*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.REP_ID) FROM DUAL) AS REP_NM /*답변자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(A.REPLY_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS REPLY_DTM /*답변일시*/ , B.MEMB_NAME AS WRTR_NM /*작성자 명*/ , B.MEMB_MAIL /*작성자 이메일*/ , B.MEMB_CPON /*작성자 연락처*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.BRD_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS BRD_GUBN_NM /*게시글 구분명*/ , A.REGP_ID /*최초등록자*/ , A.REG_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , A.MODP_ID /*수정자*/ , A.MOD_DTM /*수정일시*/ , A.ORDER_NUM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDBORDXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM B ON A.WRTR_ID = B.MEMB_ID WHERE BRD_GUBN = #{BRD_GUBN} AND BRD_NUM = #{BRD_NUM}

SELECT BRD_NUM /*게시글 번호*/ , BRD_GUBN /*게시글 구분*/ , PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_PD_NM(PD_CODE) FROM DUAL) AS PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , BRD_SBJT /*게시글 제목*/ , BRD_CONT /*게시글 내용*/ , PD_PTS /*상품 별점*/ , BRD_HITS /*게시글 조회수*/ , WRTR_ID /*작성자ID*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(WRTR_ID) FROM DUAL) AS WRTR_NM /*작성자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(WRT_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRT_DTM /*작성일시*/ , SCWT_YN /*비밀글여부*/ , BRD_PW /*게시글 비밀번호*/ , QNA_REPLY /*QNA답변*/ , DECODE(REP_ID, NULL, 'N', 'Y') AS REPLY_YN /*답변여부*/ , REP_ID /*답변자ID*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(REP_ID) FROM DUAL) AS REP_NM /*답변자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(REPLY_DTM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS REPLY_DTM /*답변일시*/ , DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDBORDXM

SELECT BRD_NUM /*게시글 번호*/ , BRD_GUBN /*게시글 구분*/ , PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_PD_NM(PD_CODE) AS PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , BRD_SBJT /*게시글 제목*/ , BRD_CONT /*게시글 내용*/ , PD_PTS /*상품 별점*/ , BRD_HITS /*게시글 조회수*/ , WRTR_ID /*작성자ID*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(WRTR_ID) AS WRTR_NM /*작성자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(WRT_DTM,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm:ss') AS WRT_DTM /*작성일시*/ , SCWT_YN /*비밀글여부*/ , BRD_PW /*게시글 비밀번호*/ , QNA_REPLY /*QNA답변*/ , DECODE(REP_ID,NULL,'N','Y') AS REPLY_YN /*답변여부*/ , REP_ID /*답변자ID*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(REP_ID) AS REP_NM /*답변자ID명*/ , TO_CHAR(REPLY_DTM,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS REPLY_DTM /*답변일시*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDBORDXM WHERE BRD_GUBN = #{BRD_GUBN}
